Articles.Content: hey guys does this work with ksp 1.1.3? if so, please tell me as I love this mod, but I only have a 56k modem and downloading this would take \*doing calculations\* OH MY GOD ***<u>62 DAYS  </u>***looks like I'm going to McDonalds for fast internet. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")
I downloaded the pack but none of the planets or stars or anything loaded, why? Please help it might just not work with 1.1.3
Sorry If I sound like an idiot but I don't see a download button what do i do?
i cant seem to get this mod to work. im not sure if this mod needs to be installed in a different way but i have put the files in game data and the systems wont load

Hey How do i get the mod to work when i start the game all the files are loaded in i could see that by the starting load bar but when im in the game i see no systems other than Kerbol and its stock system 

Please help

> 
>

>

> Hey How do i get the mod to work when i start the game all the files are loaded in i could see that by the starting load bar but when im in the game i see no systems other than Kerbol and its stock system

Well from the looks of the last umpteen posts,  I would have to assume it doesn't work in 1.1.3

It hasn't been updated in a very long time. It is probably not being developed anymore.
Can someone help me? I'm not sure how to install it. There are about six files and I don't know what file goes where! (Btw they don't all go in game data, I've tried) Thanks to anyone that can help

Yeah its outdated

RIP KERBAL GALAXY

> 2 hours ago, spacedoctor42 said:
>

> Does this work in 1.3?
> 

Not presently.

I acknowledge that a lot of you are drooling at Gargantua, which this mod adds. Well, it seems Artyomka has spun off the Interstellar portion of this mod into the "Kargantua" mod, an updated and absolutely beautiful rendition of Interstellar's worlds.

There's also a rendition of Avatar's Polyphemus system.

>

What stars are those?
Can you please change the name of the central black hole please?

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, SnakePlanet123 said:
> 
> 
> Can you please change the name of the central black hole please?
> 

(Necropost, please read the comments on the last pages before posting a new one.)

It's been about two months since the developer has checked the forums, and even longer since he last interacted with this thread. Your best bet is to manually rename the black hole and change the parent body parameter to the new name in every config.
